00025 #ifndef _BASE_NEGATEEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_NEGATEEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/UnaryOpExpression>
00030 #include <base/ProductExpression>
00031 #include <base/ConstantExpression>
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 //
00037 // Evaluates the negative of it's argument
00038 //
00039 
00040 class NegateExpression : public UnaryOpExpression 
00041 {
00042 public:
00043   NegateExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> arg)
00044     : UnaryOpExpression(arg) {}
00045   NegateExpression(const NegateExpression& e)
00046     : UnaryOpExpression(e) {}
00047 
00048   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj NegateExpression(*this); }
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("NegateExpression"); }
00050 
00051   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(UnaryOp|Negative); } 
00052 
00053   virtual String toString() const { return String("-")+arg->toString(); }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056   NegateExpression() {}
00057 
00058   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00059     { value = -arg->evaluate(params); valueCached=true; }
00060 
00061   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const
00062     {
00063       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>( NewObj NegateExpression( arg->differentiate(withRespectToIndex) ) ); 
00064       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00065       derivCached = true;
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00070     { UnaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); }
00071   
00072   friend class Expression;
00073   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<NegateExpression>;
00074 };
00075 
00076 } // base
00077 
00078 #endif
